testcase.name: Using navigation bar of PUP Site - Karate Search
testcase.system-out: Given def step1 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step2 = 'Browser Navigates to PUP website' ........................ passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph/' ........................................ passed And def step3 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * driver.maximize() ....................................................... passed And def step4 = 'Wait the document until complete' ........................ passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step5 = 'User clicks the navigation bar' .......................... passed * click('.navbar') ........................................................ passed And def step6 = 'User clicks About option' ................................ passed * click('{^a}About PUP') .................................................. passed And def step7 = 'User clicks dropdown' .................................... passed * click('.dropdown') ...................................................... passed And def step8 = 'User click Logo and Symbols under dropdown options' ...... passed * click('{^a}Logo and Symbols') ........................................... passed When def step9 = 'User clicks Academic option in Navigation Bar' .......... passed * click('{^a}Academic') ................................................... passed Then def step10 = 'User clicks Graduate Studies under Academic dropdown navigation' . passed * click('{^a}Graduate Studies') ........................................... passed
